Frank George Korn

  1. Foster Name: Frank George
  2. Foster Family: E. Lunner
  3. Location of Family: Swedeburg, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Stromsburg, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 4
  7. Date of Birth: 1910-05-24, New York City, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1971-06-15
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: Mary Ellen Johnson, comp., Orphan Train Riders: Their Own Stories vol. 6 (Baltimore: Gateway Press, 1992), p.209-213; Stromsburg Headlight, 12 February 1914; National Orphan Train Complex; Cobblestone April 1989, vol. 19, Issue 4; Find-A-Grave for Frank George Korn Peterson.
